title: GORGEOUS and HUGE 1 bedroom HARDWOOD FLOORS with Lake Merritt Views!!
posting_body: This MASSIVE (approx.
750 sq. ft.) and remodeled one bedroom is located at the Tudor Hall Apartments with INCREDIBLE Views of Lake Merritt!
This 4th Floor one bedroom features a fully equipped kitchen with all full size BRAND-NEW STAINLESS APPLIANCES: refrigerator, stove/oven, microwave, garbage disposal and DISHWASHER!
Attached to the kitchen is a beautiful dinette area.
In addition, this sunny unit has a huge living room with wonderful natural light.
This unit also has a large bedroom and two large WALK-IN CLOSETS!
Lastly, this unit has gorgeous HARDWOOD FLOORS throughout.
Truly a gorgeous apartment in a one of a kind stately Tudor style building.
The hardwood floors in this unit have just been completely refinished.
This unit will also be completely re-painted.
You are welcome to view the unit now while we are waiting for the painters!
To view the unit please contact the on-site manager Lori Miller at
show contact info
Please visit our website at <URL> for more building information
No pets please.
Amenities Include:
-On-Site Manager
-Elevator Service
-On site Laundry Facility
-Grand Entrance
-Landscaped Property
-Close by Oakland's Financial Center
Included in Rent: Water and Garbage
Please note: This unit is dedicated as smoke-free.
Parking Available for $195.00
